Learn about
our history

Our beginning

We are the gardeners of Burgas, we started from the faculty of league of legends and wanted to begin e-sports careers, but that failed so we started gardening

Our Downfall

We tried our hand at playing Counter-Strike for the same reason, but we inevitebly failed because one of our players got a girlfriend and he couldn't focus on his career

Our Awakening

Then we started trading and selling our own homemade-farts in school to our classmates and teachers
